client.discard

Interface IDiscardView

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IOverlayView, IView
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DiscardView

    public interface IDiscardView
extends IOverlayView
    Discard view interface

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setDiscardButtonEnabled(boolean enabled)
      Used to enable or disable the discard button.
      void setResourceAmountChangeEnabled(ResourceType resource, boolean increase, boolean decrease)
      Used to specify whether or not the discard amount of the specified resource can be increased and decreased.
      void setResourceDiscardAmount(ResourceType resource, int amount)
      Sets the discard amount displayed for the specified resource.
      void setResourceMaxAmount(ResourceType resource, int maxAmount)
      Sets the maximum amount displayed for the specified resource.
      void setStateMessage(java.lang.String message)
      Sets the state message, which indicates how many cards a player has set to discard, and how many remain to set.

      • Methods inherited from interface client.base.IOverlayView

        closeModal, isModalShowing, showModal

      • Methods inherited from interface client.base.IView

        getController, setController

    • Method Detail

      • setDiscardButtonEnabled

        void setDiscardButtonEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Used to enable or disable the discard button.
        Parameters:
        enabled - Whether or not the discard button should be enabled

      • setResourceDiscardAmount

        void setResourceDiscardAmount(ResourceType resource,
                            int amount)
        Sets the discard amount displayed for the specified resource.
        Parameters:
        resource - The resource for which the discard amount is being set
        amount - The new discard amount

      • setResourceMaxAmount

        void setResourceMaxAmount(ResourceType resource,
                        int maxAmount)
        Sets the maximum amount displayed for the specified resource.
        Parameters:
        resource - The resource for which the maximum amount is being set
        maxAmount - The new maximum amount

      • setResourceAmountChangeEnabled

        void setResourceAmountChangeEnabled(ResourceType resource,
                                  boolean increase,
                                  boolean decrease)
        Used to specify whether or not the discard amount of the specified resource can be increased and decreased. (The buttons for increasing or decreasing the discard amount are only visible when the corresponding operations are allowed.)
        Parameters:
        resource - The resource for which amount changes are being enabled or disabled
        increase - Whether or not the amount for the specified resource can be increased
        decrease - Whether or not the amount for the specified resource can be decreased

      • setStateMessage

        void setStateMessage(java.lang.String message)
        Sets the state message, which indicates how many cards a player has set to discard, and how many remain to set.
        Parameters:
        message - The new state message (e.g., "0/6")
